title: mri_synthsr_hyperfine
description: Implementation of SynthSR that generates a synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE from a pair of T1-T2 standard Hyperfine scans (1.5x1.5x5mm axial)

synthetic_mprage.title: Synthetic MP-RAGE
synthetic_mprage.description: Synthetic 1mm MP-RAGE(s) generated from T1 and T2 inputs
